TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebServiceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebServiceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WebServiceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用來將其他資訊加入 XML Web Service，例如描述其功能的字串。

span.span: Used to add additional information to an XML Web service, such as a string describing its functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要發佈及執行 XML Web service。The is not required for an XML Web service to be published and executed. 您可以使用`WebServiceAttribute`指定通用語言執行階段識別碼，在服務描述和服務說明頁面中用於 XML Web service 的規則不會限制 XML Web 服務的名稱。You can use the `WebServiceAttribute` to specify a name for the XML Web service that is not restricted by the rules for a common language runtime identifier, which is used in the service description and the Service help page for the XML Web service. XML Web service 應變更其預設值 XML 命名空間，才能進行公開。An XML Web service should change its default XML namespace before it is made public. 每個 XML Web 服務需要唯一的 XML 命名空間，來識別它，好讓用戶端應用程式可以區別在網站上的其他服務。Each XML Web service needs a unique XML namespace to identify it so that client applications can distinguish it from other services on the Web. http://tempuri.org/ 可供 XML Web service 正在開發，但已發佈的 XML Web 服務應該使用更永久的命名空間。http://tempuri.org/ is available for XML Web services that are under development, but published XML Web services should use a more permanent namespace. XML Web service 應可找出您所控制的 XML 命名空間。Your XML Web service should be identified by a XML namespace that you control. 例如，您可以使用您公司網際網路網域名稱的 XML 命名空間的一部分。For example, you could use your company's Internet domain name as part of the XML namespace. 雖然許多 XML Web 服務 XML 命名空間 Url 看起來，它們不需要指向在網站上的實際資源。Although many XML Web service XML namespaces look like URLs, they need not point to an actual resource on the Web. （XML Web 服務 XML 命名空間是 Uri）。對於使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web 服務，預設值 XML 命名空間可以使用變更屬性。(XML Web service XML namespaces are URIs.) For XML Web services created using ASP.NET, the default XML namespace can be changed using property. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性到 「 `Common Server Variables` "，並將 XML 命名空間設http://www.microsoft.com/。The following example sets the property of the to " `Common Server Variables` " and sets the XML namespace to http://www.microsoft.com/.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
The default value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: XML Web Service 的描述性訊息。

span.span: A descriptive message for the XML Web service.

value.span: 文字，描述 XML Web Service 的功能。

span.span: The text describing the functionality of the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 描述的訊息會顯示的 XML Web service 的潛在取用者，當產生 XML Web service 的描述文件時，例如服務描述和服務說明網頁。The descriptive message is displayed to prospective consumers of the XML Web service when description documents for the XML Web service are generated, such as the Service Description and the Service help page. ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性，以 「 `Common Server Variables` "。The following example sets the property to " `Common Server Variables` ".

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML Web service.
The name for the XML Web service.

value.span: 預設值為實作 XML Web Service 的類別名稱。

span.span: Default value is the name of the class implementing the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者瀏覽至 XML Web service 的 URL，並提供查詢字串，會產生服務描述？WSDL。The Service Description is generated when a user navigates to the URL for the XML Web service and supplies a query string of ?WSDL. 在服務描述中，屬性會識別 XML Web service 的 XML 限定名稱的本機部分。Within the Service Description, the property identifies the local part of the XML qualified name for the XML Web service. `Name`屬性也會顯示服務說明頁面上的 XML Web service 的名稱。The `Name` property is also used to display the name of the XML Web service on the Service help page. 但沒有指定 XML Web service 方法的名稱和其參數的潛在取用者瀏覽至 XML Web service 的 the.asmx 頁面時，會顯示服務說明頁面。The Service help page is displayed when a prospective consumer navigates to the.asmx page for the XML Web service without specifying an XML Web service method name and its parameters. XML 限定的名稱用來釐清具有相同名稱與 XML 文件的項目。An XML qualified name is used to disambiguate elements with the same name with an XML document. XML 限定的名稱是由下列以冒號分隔的兩個部分所組成： 命名空間或前置詞相關聯的命名空間和本機部分。An XML qualified name consists of the following two parts separated by a colon: namespace or a prefix associated with a namespace and local part. 命名空間包含的 URI 參考，以及服務描述的目的，是 windows 7屬性。The namespace consists of a URI reference and for the purposes of the Service Description, is the value of the property. 一般情況下，前置詞，這可做為 uri 的別名，是相關聯的命名空間，使所有後續的 XML 限定名稱使用的命名空間可以使用縮短的前置字元。In general, a prefix, which acts like an alias to an URI, is associated with the namespace, so that all subsequent XML qualified names using the namespace can use the shortened prefix. 本機的部分是開頭是字母或底線不包含空格的字串。The local part is a string beginning with a letter or underscore containing no spaces. 因此，用來識別服務描述中的 XML Web service 的 XML 限定的名稱是以下列格式：Therefore, the XML qualified name identifying a XML Web service in the Service Description is in the following format: : : 如需有關 XML 限定名稱，請參閱http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/。For more information on XML qualified names, see http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/. ## Examples 下列範例會設定至 XML Web service 的`MyName`。The following example sets of the XML Web service to `MyName`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Namespace : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要使用於 XML Web Service 的預設 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the default XML namespace to use for the XML Web service.

value.span: 要使用於 XML Web Service 的預設 XML 命名空間。

span.span: The default XML namespace to use for the XML Web service.

value.span: 在 屬性中指定預設。

span.span: The default is specified in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 命名空間提供的方式來建立 XML 文件所識別的統一資源識別元 (URI) 的名稱。XML namespaces offer a way to create names in an XML document that are identified by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 使用 XML 命名空間可唯一識別項目或屬性的 XML 文件。By using XML namespaces you can uniquely identify elements or attributes in a XML document. XML Web service 的服務描述被定義在 XML 中，特別是在 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL)。The service description for a XML Web service is defined in XML, specifically in Web Services Description Language (WSDL). 在服務描述中的 XML Web service，作為直接屬於 XML Web service 的 XML 項目的預設命名空間。Within the Service Description for an XML Web service, is used as the default namespace for XML elements directly pertaining to the XML Web service. XML Web service 和它的 XML Web service 方法的名稱，例如屬於在指定的命名空間`Namespace`屬性。For example, the name of the XML Web service and its XML Web service methods pertain to the namespace specified in the `Namespace` property. 屬於特定至 WSDL 項目屬於http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/命名空間。Elements that are specific to WSDL pertain to the http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/ namespace. XML Web 服務用戶端使用 SOAP 呼叫 XML Web service，您可以選擇性地加入或呼叫 XML Web service 方法。For XML Web service clients using SOAP to call an XML Web service, you can optionally add the or to call an XML Web service method. 如果呼叫的用戶端使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web service ，並屬性衍生自預設屬性。If the client is calling an XML Web service created using ASP.NET, the , and properties are all derived from the property by default. 比方說，指定的 XML Web service 方法名稱`Time`並`Namespace`屬性`http://www.contoso.com/`，則`Action`屬性是`http://www.contoso.com/Time`預設。For instance, given an XML Web service method name of `Time` and a `Namespace` property of `http://www.contoso.com/`, the `Action` property is `http://www.contoso.com/Time` by default. 若要變更的預設設定`RequestNamespace`， `ResponseNamespace`，並`Action`XML Web service 方法，您可以新增至 XML Web service 方法。To change the default settings for `RequestNamespace`, `ResponseNamespace`, and `Action` for an XML Web service method, you can add a to the XML Web service method. > [!NOTE] > XML 命名空間是不同於類別中，位於規定的命名空間[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]。An XML namespace is different from the namespace the class resides in, in terms of the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]. 若要指定類別的命名空間，請參閱[命名空間關鍵字](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/namespace-keywords.md)如果您在 C# 中撰寫。To specify the namespace for the class, see [Namespace Keywords](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/namespace-keywords.md) if you writing in C#. ## Examples 下列範例會設定來`http://www.contoso.com`，並覆寫該命名空間藉由新增屬性到`Time`XML Web service 方法。The following example sets to `http://www.contoso.com` and overrides that namespace for the property by adding a to the `Time` XML Web service method.
